parse.title: List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land

links.*: List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Evendim
The Lord of the Rings Online
The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

wikitext.*:
{{adaptation}}
{{rewrite}}
{{expansion}}

This list contains all minor characters in [[Bree-land]] that were created specifically for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]].

==Aldred Cartwright==
'''Aldred Cartwright''' is the champion trainer in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Bree-land Introduction</ref> In the Bree-land Introduction, [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]] sends the champion  player to him so he can improve the player's skills.<ref name="ReferenceB">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Honing your Skills''</ref>

==Ann Granger==
'''Ann Granger''' is a woman of [[Archet]] found near the Hunter's Lodge.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> She originally held a farm in Archet-Dale but was driven out by [[Blackwolds]] and joined [[Jon Brackenbrook]]'s hunters.<ref>''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', ''Stolen Treasures''</ref>

==Aran Greyfeather==
'''Aran Greyfeather''' is a bowyer from [[Archet]]. He sells his products west of Archet's trainings fields.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>

==Argirion==
'''Argirion''' was the first mate at the Gilminuial, a ship of the [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]] that supplies the [[Wardens of Annúminas]].<ref name="shipwrecked mariners">''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', ''The Tale of the Shipwrecked Mariners''</ref> When a storm destroyed the ship, Argirion and [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Mindambeth|Mindambeth]], the quarter master, were drowned near [[Buckland]]. He asks you to follow the [[Baranduin]] to the north to find the drowned ship and to learn the fate of the other crew members, especially of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Evendim#Aranhir|Aranhir]], the captain of the Gilminuial.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/>

==Cal Sprigley==
'''Cal Sprigley''' is a farmer in southern [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He successfully defended his farm against the [[Blackwolds]] but fled to Archet with his wife, [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Holey Sprigley|Holey Sprigley]], when the spiders overrun his farm.<ref>''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', ''Finding Reason</ref> He's a friend of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Constable Thistlewool|Constable Thistlewool]].<ref>''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', ''Beyond the Bulwarks''</ref>

==Constable Thistlewool==
'''Constable Thistlewool''' is the constable of [[Archet]] and can be found at its training grounds.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He is a friend of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]], a farmer in the south of Archet-Dale.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Beyond the Bulwarks''</ref>

==Cuthbert Rook==
'''Cuthbert Rook''' is a lore-master trainer of [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/> In the Bree-land Introduction, he improves the player's skills on [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]]'s request.<ref name="ReferenceB"/>

==Daren Mills==
'''Daren Mills''' is a hunter trainer in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He improved the player's skills in the Bree-land Introduction.<ref name="ReferenceB"/>

==Dirk Mudbrick==
'''Dirk Mudbrick''' is a member of [[Archet]]'s garrison. His original post was at Archet's West Gate but because he had too much comentare on [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s strategy, he was removed to a farm in Archet-Dale.<ref name="Spies">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: The Spies''</ref> While he was defending the sheep-farms against the wolves, he saw many [[Blackwolds]] passing through the dale.<ref name="Spies"/> He sent the player into the Archet-Dale to kill one of them and bring back their orders. One of these orders described the treason of [[Calder Cob]] and a planned raid against Archet.<ref name="Spies"/> He immediately sent the Blackwold-orders to Captain Brackenbrook and fought in the assault of Archet.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Instance: The Assault on Archet''</ref> When Archet's garrison drove the Blackwolds back to Blackwold Roost, he was one of those that was slain.<ref name="ReferenceC">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], "Prologue", ''Burying the Death''</ref>

==Edgar Standish==
'''Edgar Standish''' is a captain trainer in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He teaches the captain player how to use his class in the Bree-land Introduction.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Honing Your Skills''</ref>

==Fastred Burrows==
'''Fastred Burrows''' is a burglar trainer in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/> On [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]]'s request he teaches the player more about his class in the Bree-land Introduction.<ref name="ReferenceB"/>

==Fenton Marshly==
'''Fenton Marshly''' is one of [[Jon Brackenbrook]]'s hunters.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He started hunting game as soon as he was strong enough to wield a bow.<ref name="Fento">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Skimming the Surface''</ref> When the [[Blackwolds]] started to assault [[Archet]], he was stationed at the Hunter's Lodge.<ref name="Fento"/>

==Godwig the Lazy==
'''Godwig the Lazy''' is a man from [[Archet]], who can be found in Archet's Jailyard.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>

==Hodor Thornberry==
'''Hodor Thornberry''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] weapon-trader from [[Archet]]. He sells both one-handed as two-handed weapons.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>

==Holey Sprigley==
'''Holey Sprigley''' is the wife of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]],<ref name="Reason">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Finding Reason''</ref> a farmer in the south of [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> When their farm was overrun they fled to Archet.<ref name="Reason"/>

==Jasper Greensmith==
'''Jasper Greensmith''' is a light armoursmith in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/>

==Kate Henseed==
'''Kate Henseed''' is a female supplier from [[Archet]]<ref name="ReferenceA"/> who informs the player that [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]] is looking for him.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Amdir's Request''</ref>

==Mildred Catchfly==
'''Mildred Catchfly''' is the medium armoursmith in [[Archet]]. She is found west of the training fields.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>

==Mindambeth==
'''Mindambeth''' is a [[Rangers of the North|Ranger]] and the quartermaster of the Gilminuial. She and [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Argirion|Argirion]] drowned near [[Buckland]] when the ship was drowned.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/>

==Nate Whisperwood==
'''Nate Whisperwood''' is a male hunter of [[Archet]]. He could be found inside the Hunter's Lodge.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He fought in the assault of Archet and was slain while defending the Hunter's Lodge.<ref name="ReferenceC"/>

==Old Bloodtusk==
'''Old Bloodtusk''' was a boar in [[Archet|Archet-dale]] between [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]'s Farm and [[Blackwold's Roost]]. He lived in his den, built in a rotten, old tree stump.<ref name="Old Bloodtusk">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Old Bloodtusk''</ref> He always went to the walls of Cal Sprigley's Farm in search of food. One day, he went into the farm and killed one of the farmhands. Afterwards, Cal Sprigley sent the player to Old Bloodtusk's Den to kill him.<ref name="Old Bloodtusk"/>

==Otto the Brigand==
'''Otto the Brigand''' was leader of the [[Blackwolds|brigands]] that attacked [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Captain Brackenbrook''</ref> He was imprisoned by [[Calder Cob]] but was freed in the Assault of Archet where he takes Amdir as prisoner to their hideout.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Instance: The Assault of Archet''</ref>  When the player and [[Aragorn]] assault the Blackwolds in Ost Baranor he is turned into a wraith by [[Skorgrím Dourhand]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, Book 1: "Stirrings in the Darkness", ''Instance: Unravelling the Thread''</ref>

==Peg Pruner==
'''Peg Pruner''' is [[Archet]]'s provisioner<ref name="ReferenceA"/> and [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s quartermaster.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Fresh Suplies''</ref> She is [[Ned Pruner]]'s wife.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Question the Prisoner''</ref>

==Sergeant Redroot==
'''Sergeant Redroot''' is a member of [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s garrison. He was originally posted at [[Archet]]'s gate<ref name="ReferenceA"/> but was removed to the road between Archet and [[Combe]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], "Prologue"</ref>

==Teal Saddler==
'''Teal Saddler''' is a guardian trainer who can be found west of [[Archet]]'s training grounds.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> She improves the player's skills in the Bree-land Introduction.<ref name="ReferenceB"/>

==Tolman Gardner==
'''Tolman Gardner''' is a minstrel trainer in [[Archet]].<ref name="ReferenceA"/> During the Bree-land Introduction, he teaches the player how to use his class.<ref name="ReferenceB"/>

==Will Wheatley==
'''Will Wheatley''' is [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]'s farmhand, and can be found at Cal Sprigley's farm in southern [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref name="ReferenceA"/> He fought in the assault of Archet and was slain by [[Blackwolds]] near [[Blackwold's Roost]].<ref name="ReferenceC"/>
